item.title: The polkadot parachain PoV
item.description: Introduction If you know something about the Polkadot Parachain, you must have heard of one term: PoV. It appears in the substrate pull requests, the polkadot official docs, forum and almost everywhere the Polkadot Parachain appears. So, what is the PoV? Why does it appear so often in the ecosystem? I’ll try to dig into a little deeper. What is the PoV? Once our question was clear, I easily found this helpful answer What does PoV stand for?
